900434050.baseEffect_: Gain an empty play point orb.
900434050.baseFlair_: I'm fighting too. I did horrible things in the past, and I have so much to atone for. I was weak and cowardly and all I could do was run. But along the way, I had people come to me and give me courage. And I owe them. That's why I'm here. I have debts to repay.

900434060.baseFlair_: Very well, I shall join the fray. Just a whim of mine—nothing more. I am the poison that seeps through the dark, the Forest Shadow. And I am the only villain this forest needs.

101411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
101411010.baseFlair_: A youthful white dragon offers a prayer to the heavens. It prays that one day, no matter how many years hence, it shall become the equal of its parents.
101411010.evoFlair_: A youthful white dragon offers a prayer to the heavens. It prays that one day it shall fulfill a great purpose like its parents before it.

117411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to 1, then draw a card and gain +2/+1.
117411020.baseFlair_: Oh, was that your dragon? Sorry, didn't mean to scare you. I hate dragons. Hate 'em. Just looking at 'em makes my blood boil. So what I'm saying is, you'd better keep it away from me if you value its life.
117411020.evoFlair_: My little sister was poisoned by dragon venom. She was knocking at death's door. That's why I'll slay 'em to make weapons and profit. Their carcasses are fair game—I'll take whatever I want from 'em.

118411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Bullet Bike into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, summon it instead.
118411020.baseFlair_:
Soo, in other words the client wants bolts that can be magically heated up? And they want them strong enough to withstand a dragon possibly stomping on them? Huh. Am... Am I really up for this?
—Reggie, Peerless Artisan's Blueprint No. 1
118411020.evoFlair_:
Ta-da! Behold my Flamebolts! They're made of an alloy I created from fire wyrm scales and dragonite! They react to magical energy by creating heat. Here, let me give you a demo for marketing purpo— Aiyeee!
—Delivery No. 1 for Reggie, Peerless Artisan

900411040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
900411040.baseFlair_: Young drakes dream of the day they'll be able to spread their wings to roam their vast domain in the skies.
900411040.evoFlair_: Young drakes dream of the day they'll be able to spread their wings, covering the sky from the realm below.

110421020.baseEffect_: At the start of the opponent's turn, restore 2 defense to all other allied followers.
110421020.baseFlair_: I wonder what I'm cut out for... There's gotta be more out there than being a mermaid. I mean, the ocean gets old quick. It's nothing but water and fish!
110421020.evoFlair_: I wanna run across the grass and fly through the air! Ahh, I'm so booored. Maybe I'll get lucky and something interesting will fall from the skies...

110421030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, deal 1 damage to that follower and draw a card.
110421030.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. Refuse, and it's coming clean off. Then you'll see how powerless you are.
110421030.evoFlair_:
The Second Rule: Spread Impotence
Those who swing their might around won't last long. Cut them down—this is your mission.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

112431010.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
When you play a spell, evolve this follower.
112431010.baseFlair_: Thanks to the development of highly durable materials and technology rivaling the output of dragons, we have succeeded in creating aerial equipment. Now, rather than purely mimicking the power of dragons, we set our sights even further. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 3
112431010.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Strike: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw a card.
112431010.evoFlair_: If we're going to create something greater than a dragon, it will have to surpass dragons in every way, shape, and form. But who knows if such a thing is even possible. —Voice Recording of an Environmental Researcher, Part 3

114431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower (excluding Marion, Elegant Dragonewt) from your deck into your hand and give it +1/+0.
114431020.baseFlair_: Loving yourself is so important. And if you need a little help, I'm here for you! Wanna be cute? Cool? Breathtaking? I know how to make your charm shine!
114431020.evoFlair_:
"He's a kind-hearted person who taught me how to accessorize." —Safira, Synthetic Beast
"Hehe! His fashion sense isn't half bad! I'd give him a passing grade!" —Fashionista Nelcha

900431040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower comes into play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
When this follower leaves play, put four 1-play point Eternal Whales into your deck. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
900431040.baseFlair_: A calf once fell from the sky. With no way back, it made the sea its home. What was the ring floating above its head? The whale did not know. But then came the day it breached, and its enlightenment surfaced.
900431040.evoFlair_: The great white whale continues its migration in the clouds. Though nurtured by blue waters, the whale has returned to where it belongs. And now, from the highest seas above, it watches over its home away from home.

100414020.baseEffect_: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
100414020.baseFlair_: The dark mages chanted their incantation, drew magic circles, and brought forth flame. The dragon responded with only a fiery sigh.

107414010.baseEffect_: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Windblast Dragon.
107414010.baseFlair_: Break free and unleash the tempest.

115414010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 to an allied follower until the end of the turn.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
115414010.baseFlair_:
A stream of energy spreads throughout the land and ascends like a raging dragon. It pierces the heavens, producing a meteor shower seen by all beings.
—Legend of the Three Nations, First Scroll

713414010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 to an allied follower until the end of the turn.
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
713414010.baseFlair_: The Vermilion Dynasty is dead already!

107424010.baseEffect_:
Put a Maelstrom Dragon into your hand.
Enhance (3): Put 1 more into your hand.
107424010.baseFlair_: Clear skies and brisk winds. But alas, a tempest brews on the horizon. —Dragonwatcher

114424010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Windblast Dragon into your hand.
114424010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the elder dragon discovered her kindness in the laboratory, he saw a ferocious, primal aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those driven to survival.

116424010.baseEffect_:
Discard a card.
Draw a card. If Overflow is active for you, draw 2 instead.
116424010.baseFlair_:
Such is humanity's pathetic lust for gold that the foul creatures would part with treasures most dear for even a speck. That greed has kept me well fed.
—Fafnir

900424040.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and draw 2 cards.
900424040.baseFlair_: We received the wisdom of the divine dragon. And at the same time, we lost the freedom to choose.

900424050.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and draw 2 cards.
900424050.baseFlair_:
"Woo-hoo! What's our next target, Nova?"
"Fuel reserves depleted. Refuel recommended."
"You're kidding, right?!"
—Rola and Nova

119424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 to an allied Dragoncraft follower.
If Overflow is active for you, give +2/+2 instead and draw a card.
119424010.baseFlair_: All ranch hands must adhere to the following rules. 1. Never approach large dragons from behind. 2. Never rub the scales on a dragon's neck the wrong way. 3. Never let your dragons see you cry when they leave home. See them off with a smile! —Dragon Ranch Employee Notice

715424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 to an allied Dragoncraft follower.
If Overflow is active for you, give +2/+2 instead and draw a card.
715424010.baseFlair_:
Wow, a fire-breathing dragon! This is way too cool!
—Mio Honda

121424010.baseEffect_:
Put a random Natura follower from your deck into your hand.
If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, put 2 random Natura followers with different names from your deck into your hand instead.
121424010.baseFlair_: It happens one day, after the heroes depart. A tiny child's creation catches the shadow's eye. The encounter forges a bond, creating a community of beastfolk and robots centered around their beloved Forest Shadow. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 8

110434010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an allied follower. Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
110434010.baseFlair_: I'll crush it to rubble, until even the ruins are just ashes and dust!

120434010.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck.
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
120434010.baseFlair_:
All dragons were born from flame. And now the time has come to return to your mother.
—Prime Dragon Keeper

900434030.baseEffect_:
Put a Windblast Dragon and a Dragon into your hand.
Enhance (10): Summon them instead.
900434030.baseFlair_:
His voice echoes into the distant clouds.
His followers' baying response descends like thunder.

900444030.baseEffect_:
Give +0/+1 to a follower in your hand.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only if there is a targetable card in your hand.)
900444030.baseFlair_: What good is the sky if you can't fly in it?

900444040.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if this card is in your hand and there are 3 or less Curse of the Black Dragons in your hand, activate the following effects.
-If Overflow is not active for you, reveal this card and deal 1 damage to your leader.
-If you have 10 play point orbs, reveal this card and deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
900444040.baseFlair_: This curse is mine to bear; it's a symbol of my weakness. But I'll overcome it and turn it into strength—a strength that will protect everyone!

104412010.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader, draw a card, and destroy this amulet if Overflow is active for you.
104412010.baseFlair_: Adventurers' mouths water at the value of dragon eggs; dragon hatchlings' mouths water at the taste of adventurers.

113433010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (20)
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Subtract 10 from this amulet's Countdown and summon 2 Hellflame Dragons.
Whenever an allied follower comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Dragon Sphere.
113433010.baseFlair_: Ooh, shiny stuff! Found some more! —Goblin Mage

102442010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, transform all cards in your hand that originally cost 3 play points or less into Hellflame Dragons.
Once on each of your turns, when you play a Hellflame Dragon, give it Storm.
If Overflow is active for you, whenever a card that originally costs 3 play points or less is added to your hand, transform it into a Hellflame Dragon.
102442010.baseFlair_: A melody to summon dragons from the ends of the world.

100411010.baseEffect_: Gain +2/+0 if Overflow is active for you.
100411010.baseFlair_: My dragon and I act as one! Don't think you can underestimate the bond between us! No one can escape our wrath!
100411010.evoFlair_: You think he likes me because I'm nice? Ha! He eats nice guys for lunch. No, if you want to be partners with a dragon, you've got to show that you're tough enough!

101411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
101411020.baseFlair_: Winds blow. A tempest brews. And then from the eye of the storm a mighty dragon emerges.
101411020.evoFlair_: A brutal gale cuts across the battlefield. The forces of evil are scattered towards the heavens.

101411060.baseFlair_: A desert-dwelling dragon that flaps its wings to summon sandstorms, which bring both destruction and the occasional good fortune.
101411060.evoFlair_: The sandstorms summoned by this dragon occasionally contain treasures that had been buried in the dunes—a spot of good fortune for those courageous enough to brave the storms.

101411110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
101411110.baseFlair_: This creature's a little too cute to be called a dragon, but touch it and you'll end up with more than just a burn.
101411110.evoFlair_: This creature looks just like an ordinary lizard, but its bites turn people into piles of smoldering ash!

102411020.baseFlair_: Incited by its allies' fury, the foul serpentine dragon roars with animosity.
102411020.evoFlair_: Goaded on by the fury of its allies, the serpentine dragon loses itself in its rage.

102411040.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of cards discarded.
102411040.baseFlair_: I mostly just rage, but a hard day's work couldn't hurt either.
102411040.evoFlair_: I'm a punch first, think later kind of girl, which is really too bad for you!

103411050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower +1/+1 if Overflow is active for you.
103411050.baseFlair_: Dragons are my friends, every one of 'em. I'm not strong, and I don't have any powerful magic... but I always know what dragons are feeling somehow.
103411050.evoFlair_: Dragons are my friends, every one of 'em—the timid ones, the short-tempered ones, and every other. So if you try to hurt my dragons, they won't be the only ones fighting back.

103411060.baseEffect_: If this card is discarded, summon a Luxfang Kit.
103411060.baseFlair_: Call for help and I'll fly to you! Don't call for help and I'll still fly to you! To do otherwise would just be wrong.
103411060.evoFlair_: I don't know much about good and evil and all that stuff... But if there's any chance of making the world a better place, I'll fight!

105411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
105411010.baseFlair_: Open, portal of summoning! Answer my voice—may great wings beat here!
105411010.evoFlair_: Your body is my body. Your life is my life. Live the future together with me, winged compatriots!

106411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fire Lizard into your hand.
106411010.baseFlair_: My dear little one, it's meal time. Make sure you eat my special lava stew slowly, okay?
106411010.evoFlair_: My dear little one, you've grown so quickly, haven't you? I'm looking forward to the day I'll be able to ride on your back.

108411040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Dragon's Nest into your hand.
108411040.baseFlair_: Many days have passed since I first laid eyes upon the whitewyrm. It rested on the land, motionless but for the heavy opening and shutting of its eyelids. Could it have been slumbering? Or was it perhaps... —A researcher's notes
108411040.evoFlair_: I saw it many cycles ago. The whitewyrm slumbered, concentrating its power. The power, that is, to produce the egg that will produce a new generation! —A researcher's notes

109411010.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, gain Bane.
109411010.baseFlair_: How big's your prey? That's the true mark of a hunter's skills, and why I don't even bother wasting time with small-fry monsters. The dragons on high are mine to hunt!
109411010.evoFlair_: I mean, where's the prestige in hunting weaklings? Only the dragons that feed in the heavens on high are fit to die by my blade!

110411030.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, draw a card.
110411030.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. One who recognizes not their own stupidity is completely powerless before one who does. Will you accept your folly or will you be trampled?
110411030.evoFlair_:
The First Rule: Declare Impotence
Anyone born in this day and age is completely powerless. Those who don't recognize this are the most foolish of all.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

111411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to another random allied follower. Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
111411020.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. The powerless are parasites on this world—erase them all and let us enjoy a paradise for the strong.
111411020.evoFlair_: In the shadow of law stand the strong. For the strong must exercise their right to erase the powerless from this world—go forth and crush them as they cower before your might!

112411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4 and summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
112411010.baseFlair_: This girl found and raised an orphaned baby dragon. She said she did it because she'd always intended to fight alongside a fearsome wyrm, but in reality she's just the type that could never abandon an innocent life.
112411010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112411010.evoFlair_: This girl explores the world on dragonback after raising her steed herself. If her original intention in adopting the wyrm is to be believed, then she has already met her goal. And yet she is still unable to ignore the cries of the little ones she encounters on her way.

112411030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Overflow is active for you, deal 1 damage to all followers.
112411030.baseFlair_: The fishermen that frequent this bay, whenever they discuss their bad luck, they don't says stuff like, "Couldn't even get a bite." No siree, they says, "Oh gods why?! I caught the Big One!" —Sailor's Talk
112411030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Overflow is active for you, deal 3 damage to all followers.
112411030.evoFlair_: The Big One—as they calls it—it eats everything under the waves, even poisonous and spikey stuff. This might just be hearsay, but they says if you catch it on purpose, it'll make you wish you'd never been a fisherman. —Sailor's Talk

113411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied Machina follower is in play, gain Storm.
113411010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Mechafin Diver is always pursing greater depths, even when it comes to marine technological research. The mermaid is seeking additional swimming speed. —Logbook of a Seaside Research Facility 1
113411010.evoFlair_: Diving deep is fun enough. But the faster you swim, the more sea you see! I want to deliver some great memories to the folks on the shore. —Gadget Mermaid to Mechafin Diver

114411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.
114411030.baseFlair_:
That powerful frame, filled with savage lightning... He's so cool! And the way he crackles with electricity illuminates the whole area... which is kinda reassuring. It makes me... wanna touch him. D'ya think he'd get mad?
—A young traveler visiting Dinosaur Island
114411030.evoFlair_:
The velociraptor is endowed with incredible lightning powers. After being struck by lightning multiple times, its body adapted so that it could hold a charge. A single touch could spell electrocution. Approach with caution.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

115411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
Enhance (6): Deal 2 damage instead. Gain +3/+3.
115411010.baseFlair_:
The power of dragons dwells within people. This world truly is mysterious. Amidst a world-shaking dance, three keen gazes smile in secret.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Second Scroll
115411010.evoFlair_:
Three nations are built upon three spots of power—Shuren, Konru, and Suiheki. A rivalry arises between the leaders who each hold their own conflicting ambitions. And so the curtain rises on the Dragonkin War!
—Legend of the Three Nations, Third Scroll

116411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card and deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if a Natura card was discarded, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Draw a card.
116411030.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it smashes those rocks, what a little cutie. From its big stony body, to its hammer-tail, I just love it. And look at its feetsies! Do you think it would eat me if I tried to pet it?
—Clueless Vacationer, on Her Visit to Dinosaur Island
116411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116411030.evoFlair_:
The dinosaurs noticed that their land was beginning to change, to become encased in steel. But, to them, this was just another natural phenomenon. Just as water flows to find a true course, they, too, began to adapt.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 1

117411010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card and deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Activates only when both a targetable card is in your hand and a targetable enemy follower is in play.)
Enhance (5): Gain +3/+3.
117411010.baseFlair_: She is the Five of Cups, vessel of loss. Obstructions in life are like a dam, causing some paths to wither and dry. But as sad as that may be, new channels will surely spring forth.
117411010.evoFlair_: I'm a dragon keeper and quencher of parched earth. I shed a single tear into a dried-up lake. For now, it's a mere drop in the bucket. But someday, it'll rival any sea.

117411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Tropical Grouper.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Tropical Grouper.
117411030.baseFlair_:
Today I learned that the young live in waters with few predators. They're quite docile and reproduce quickly, darting about in schools for safety. Breathtaking. Like rainbows of the deep.
—A Traveler
117411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117411030.evoFlair_:
As adults, they invade calm waters lookin' for easy pickin's. Savage is what they are, swarmin' all over like locusts of the sea. If you see those colors, you'd better not be in the water!
—Local Angler

119411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Enhance (5): Gain +2/+2. Draw a card.
119411030.baseFlair_: I was always too weak and sickly to do anything... But now I've been reborn! With this new body, the whole ocean is my playground!
119411030.evoFlair_: It's weird, I feel like my vision's getting worse lately... Kind of blurry... And whenever I get close to land, I can smell something... something rEAllY TASty. WhAT's tHIs StUff in mY mOUth? Is... iS THiS bLooD...?

119411040.baseEffect_: Once each turn, when this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
119411040.baseFlair_: Barriers do not exist for the residents of the seven seas. Neither do the merfolk hold prejudice against other species. They return goodwill with sincere hearts, and sometimes, that sincerity blossoms into love.
119411040.evoFlair_: Land or sea, there is no place to escape from a merfolk scorned. Should one be foolish enough to earn their ire, what awaits is swift retribution in the form of an arrow through the heart.

120411010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck.
120411010.baseFlair_: There's a legend on the surface about a round jewel that can show you the future if you know just the right chant. Here we go! "Pain, pain, go away!" Huh... Why isn't it working?
120411010.evoFlair_:
"Wow, the pain in my fin totally went away... I think!"
"She might not know the future, but talking with her does perk me up!"
—Reviews from Satisfied Mermaids

900411030.baseFlair_: A sea beast that does the bidding of larger creatures. Though its body is soft, its fangs are hard.
900411030.evoFlair_: A sea beast that lives in harmony with larger creatures. It nimbly maneuvers its soft body to swim circles around its prey.

107421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Blazing Breath.
107421010.baseFlair_: Can't say I'm really into the barbaric type. Don't even try to come at me—I'm one with the dragonewts, didn't you know?
107421010.evoFlair_: Not a huge fan of getting my hands dirty to be quite honest—if you could just behave yourself, you'll save both of us a lot of trouble, okay?

108421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform a Dragoncraft card in your hand into a Dragon's Handspur.
108421010.baseFlair_: It's ironic. The more I hate dragons and hunt them, the more my blade looks like a dragon's talon.
108421010.evoFlair_: To hunt dragons, you need incredible force. So unconsciously I've come to imitate the beasts. It's fine though. I'll wipe them all out of existence.

109421020.baseEffect_: If you have at least 7 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Whitescale Dragon or Blackscale Dragon.
109421020.baseFlair_: Upon awakening from an eternal dream, how does a young dragon see? With eyes of purity and affection, or eyes pained with malice?
109421020.evoFlair_: Upon breaking out of its shell, what does a young dragon learn? Is it the purity of love, or the corruption of hatred?

112421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Machina follower is in play, gain +1/+0 and Rush.
112421010.baseFlair_: This li'l guy is a fiery one! He'll protect his friends, even if those friends are made of metal!
112421010.evoFlair_: This li'l guy is a cool one! If you hurt his friends, you'll incur his flaming wrath!

114421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a Giselle, Mermaid Healer or Gadget Mermaid into your hand.
114421010.baseFlair_: Hear the mermaids sing: nautical slang to be shipwrecked
114421010.evoFlair_: Marry a mermaid: nautical slang to drown

115421030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Storm.
115421030.baseFlair_: Think you can keep up? If not, I'll leave you behind. This is my turf here on the ice. If you can't match my speed, you can drop dead for all I care.
115421030.evoFlair_: Whoa, why are your teeth chattering so hard? Is it your first time on the ice? In that case, I guess it's time to say goodbye. I'll settle this with one cool move.

117421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of a card discarded by an effect this turn into your hand.
117421020.baseFlair_: Nothin's gonna stop me from baggin' a sea dragon today! Plus these huge hooks'll make trollin' for fish a breeze! Now that's what I call a two for one!
117421020.evoFlair_: Sea dragons are the kings of the ocean! They're huge, and they got fangs, and tails, and wings, and—whoaaa! I think I just saw one jump outta the water!

118421020.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, summon a Bullet Bike. If Overflow is active for you, summon a Hellflame Dragon instead.
118421020.baseFlair_:
Tools sharper and tougher than a dragon's claw? I see the utility in making them lightweight, but will they even work if they're that light? Hrngh? Who said anything about not being able to pull it off?!
—Reggie, Peerless Artisan's Blueprint No. 2
118421020.evoFlair_:
The blade's crafted from cloven azurewings and ornamented with cloud dragon motifs—my finest work yet. I call these tools Dragon Claws. Well, my work here is done. Still... What're you hoping to make with them?
—Delivery No. 2 for Reggie, Peerless Artisan

120421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 3 defense, summon a Hippocampus.
120421020.baseFlair_:
Many creatures make their home in the coral oasis atop this shark's back. Worshipped by fishermen, it's said that just glimpsing the shark guarantees an abundant catch. But among merfolk, it is feared as a mirage.
—Ocean Adventurer's Log
120421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120421020.evoFlair_:
The ocean is as abundant with water as the desert is with sand. As land dwellers are guided by landmarks, so too are merfolk by coral reefs. Due to the mobile nature of the coral oasis, many a merfolk flounder and become lost.
—Ocean Adventurer's Log

121421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
121421010.baseFlair_: See that big tree over there, my steelclad friends? That's the patrol route perimeter. We've gotta have a plan, even if we're not expecting any battles. Heh, at least, that's what a friend told me once.
121421010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
121421010.evoFlair_:
"Hah! Hyah! Take that!"

110421010.baseFlair_: A single house is about all I can protect on my own. But with my griffin, I can defend the entire kingdom!

110421010.evoFlair_: One or two people are about all I could keep safe on my own. That's why I fight with my partner here—so I can keep all the citizens safe!

113421010.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a boy with glasses around here? His name's Zell, and he looks like a bit of a know-it-all. Huh, you just saw him on the ground? Th-thanks! I'd better hurry up after him!
113421010.evoFlair_: Zell's a little stubborn and stiff and the opposite of polite... But he's a trusty partner who knows the wind better than anyone! Don't tell Zell I said this though—I'd be so self-conscious if he found out.

116421010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Give +2/+0 to another allied Machina follower.
116421010.baseFlair_:
Conducted an experiment on the captured dragon, improved its body with technology. Can be used to control other dragons. Should make for the ultimate specimen. Revolutionary stuff, really.
—Engineer's Notes, Part 2
116421010.evoFlair_:
Dragons are immutable and governed by instinct. But the dragons of old were experts in changing their form. To control them, we will need greater flames. The dragonfolk shall see the steel of their intention tempered yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 2

120421010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 5 defense, evolve it.
120421010.baseFlair_: I'm the one holding up our troops, so it's only appropriate that I carry around a big pillar! But this is no ordinary pillar—it's a manifestation of my spirit! The flames on this bad boy can burn the hide off the toughest dragon. Can you hold a candle to that, whelp?
120421010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120421010.evoFlair_: You've got guts, coming at me head-on like that! But that arrogance will be your downfall! I'll smash you so hard you'll be needing a pillar of your own to stand! Now, bring it! Show me the strength that supports your resolve!

101431070.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
101431070.baseFlair_: An enchanting yet poisonous princess emerges from the mists, accompanied by her dragon. The beast exhales a poisonous miasma that hides both the beast and its mistress.
101431070.evoFlair_: The dragon's cloud of noxious fumes is a sanctuary for the dragon and its mistress. Those who venture into it soon find their skin burnt to a crisp and their bones turned to dust.

104431030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 for each of your remaining play points.
104431030.baseFlair_: A defender that dwells in the clear sea. It allies itself only with the pure of heart and crushes the souls of the impure.
104431030.evoFlair_: A guardian that dwells in the ever-changing waters. Its power grows as great as its commander wishes, and it wields its power with abandon.

109431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
109431020.baseFlair_: Master always said that dragons and magic were of the same... What did he mean by those words? I decided to see for myself firsthand.
109431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand.
109431020.evoFlair_: Master always said magic and dragons were of the same kin... Now I finally understand. The depths of their powers are as infinite as the abysses of magic.

110431010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +2/+0.
110431010.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. Status and wisdom—pointless. Pretty faces, solid bodies—perfectly useless. You would do well to serve we who understand this.
110431010.evoFlair_:
The Third Rule: Control Impotence
Only you that have looked upon impotence may deign to control the powerless. Guide them. Rule them.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

110431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, Choose - Put a Dragoon's Command or Dragoon's Meditation into your hand.
110431020.baseFlair_: The dragoon hails from beyond the drifting clouds. His heart is as clear as the spreading sky, and his voice unfurls like mighty wings, broad enough to shelter the heavens.
110431020.evoFlair_: Weaving his way between the clouds, he descends. His lance rends the soil so his prayers may permeate the earth.

113431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Change this follower into an Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds or summon an enemy Adelle, Jealous Dragon.
113431020.baseFlair_: The celebrated dragon slayer was ordered to strike down another wicked beast. To him this was just a job, but to his wife it was just plain infidelity: "A-Adelle? What are you doing here?"
113431020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
113431020.evoFlair_: The dragon slayer's saga devolved into a senseless argument between husband and wife. The scorned love turned to jealousy a thousandfold. The swordsman faces off against his wife's rage: "I-I am not cheating on you! Adelle?"

115431030.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0 and give this follower -1/-1. (This effect activates even when attacked or damaged for 0. This follower is destroyed when its defense drops below 1.)
115431030.baseFlair_:
Our attacks hit its armored body like so many droplets of water. But even stone will wear away if you continue dripping water in one spot. Slow and steady kills the dragon... Let's show it just how stubborn people can be!
—Young anti-dragon battalion officer
115431030.evoFlair_:
The dragon's body becomes increasingly robust with every passing day. Upon hearing that report, the soldiers all fell to their knees. In the end, we people were not even as effective as raindrops.
—Veteran anti-dragon battalion officer

119431010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +1/+0.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
119431010.baseFlair_: You! Prepare to meet your makeeerr—Ah! Ungh! What's this rope doing here? I won't let your petty traps get to— Huh?! Argh! I-I'm getting all tangled in the ropes! Ungh, I wish I were dead!
119431010.evoFlair_: My father became a follower of Zeyen and brought war to our country. He also took my sister with him. I can't let his misdeeds continue. That's why I have to be the one to stop him, no matter what the cost...

900431020.baseFlair_:
"Roooar..." (Sorry for ever getting the wrong idea!)
"It's fine, Adelle. We're in love now after all."
"Grr! Groar!" (Stop, Ian! You're embarrassing me!)
—Ian and Adelle
900431020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Drain.
Evolve: Return all other allied followers to your hand.
900431020.evoFlair_:
"Hey, little baby girl. I'm ready for some time alone with you."
"Grroarr!" (Leave it to me. I'll knock this out.)
"D-don't get too carried away! Adelle?"
—Ian and Adelle

900431030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
900431030.baseFlair_:
"Grooar! Rrr!" (How could you betray my love, Ian!)
"Grrrrrah!" (Sneaking into another dragon's lair—you're cheating on me!)
900431030.evoFlair_:
"Groooar!" (I'm not listening to your excuses.)
"Roooar" (All the love I felt for you is turning to rage!)

111441010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: Whenever you play a card that originally costs at least 7 play points for the fourth time or later, invoke this card.
Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, remove all effects on this follower except changes to its attack or defense.
111441010.baseFlair_: A mighty gust erupts, rending clouds of white in two. Heard beyond the wind, transcending both sound and light, "None can keep pace with my wings."
111441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111441010.evoFlair_: With the force of a single flap, the earth below is fractured asunder. Heard beyond a flash of light and a thunderous clap, "None can escape the rending of my wings."

111441030.baseFlair_:
It dwells upon the land. It has fangs like a tiger's, a forked tongue. It brings the rains and the drought; the heavens' mercy and their wrath. Bow your heads in respect before the oldest of the gods.
—Chapter 2, Prosperity of the Water God
111441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied follower attacks, if you have at least 3 play points, use 3 play points and deal 1 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
111441030.evoFlair_:
It bequeaths blessing and blight without discrimination. Both fall to earth amidst the sonorous rumblings of the skies.
—Chapter 3, Prosperity of the Water God

114441020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Shadow's Corrosion into your hand.
114441020.baseFlair_:
"Viridia Magna will destroy Naterra. We must end her."
Forever stalking, forever analyzing...
"We are Mánagarmr. We seek to destroy the Vile Mother."
The Forest Shadow seeks to deliver the cursed world despite its cowardly king.
114441020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Reduce the cost of all Shadow's Corrosions in your hand by 2.
114441020.evoFlair_:
"Of course Sköll thinks our methods barbaric."
Unyielding eyes peer into the blinding light.
"Perhaps we should give up. But it's too late to turn back now, you see."
The Forest Shadow grins, his decision made.

714441010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Shadow's Corrosion into your hand.
714441010.baseFlair_:
"Viridia Magna will destroy Naterra. We must end her."
Forever stalking, forever analyzing...
"We are Mánagarmr. We seek to destroy the Vile Mother."
The Forest Shadow seeks to deliver the cursed world despite its cowardly king.
714441010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Reduce the cost of all Shadow's Corrosions in your hand by 2.
714441010.evoFlair_:
"Of course Sköll thinks our methods barbaric."
Unyielding eyes peer into the blinding light.
"Perhaps we should give up. But it's too late to turn back now, you see."
The Forest Shadow grins, his decision made.

118441030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Play point orbs can't be lost. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to the enemy leader. If you have 10 play point orbs, deal 4 damage instead.
118441030.baseFlair_: There once was a noxious dragon who terrorized the land. To appease its bloodlust, the people offered sacrifices. Amid this grievous situation came a red-caped holy knight. He swore that the people would lose not a single treasure more to the dragon.
118441030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
118441030.evoFlair_: The knight effortlessly repelled the pernicious dragon's arsenal of attacks. With spear in hand, the knight chastised all in his path and struck down the dragon. The people were overjoyed and sang songs of praise to the great dragonslayer, Georgius.

119441010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Whenever this follower takes damage equal to or greater than its defense, survive on 1 defense.
Skybound Art (10): Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Super Skybound Art (15): Gain the ability to attack 3 times per turn.
119441010.baseFlair_: Hey! Do you like your dragon boiled or grilled? What am I talking about? I just caught a dragon, that's what. You're having some, right? Oh, there's also cake! Siero gave me some!
119441010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119441010.evoFlair_: I don't want you to end up as someone's food. But only the powerful can protect the things that are important to them. I'm gonna become the strongest, so I can protect you and everybody else!

119441030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied follower the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Can't be attacked.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Then, give -1/-1 to all enemy followers. If Overflow is active for you, restore 4 defense and give -2/-2 instead. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
119441030.baseFlair_: A primal beast pactbound to Port Breeze. Her gentle breath rocks the cradles of babes; her maternal winds embrace the people like a warm shawl. The goddess smiles down upon the archipelago, blessing one and all with her love.
119441030.evoFlair_: The goddess prays for eternal tranquility. She is reverent of the heart and believes firmly in love. Yet when those she holds dear are threatened, her three-headed companion bares its fangs and her breezes become violent storms to scatter her foes to the ends of the sky.

121441020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Strike: Give +0/+2, Rush, and Bane to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
When this follower leaves play, summon an Aftershock. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
121441020.baseFlair_: I was born bearing the might of the dragon and the power of lightning. Fate dealt me this hand—I didn't get to choose any of it. But there is one thing I've decided for myself: I'll do my best with what I've been given and bring my people glory.
121441020.evoFlair_: She always turned her words to action. Blessed with the fulminous dragon's power, she fulfilled her vow—she joined the army, made a name for herself, and became the lightning that saved us all. Only one such as she is deserving of the accolade "Lightning Striker."

100414030.baseEffect_: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
100414030.baseFlair_: A searing ray of fire burns all near and far.

101414030.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Give +3/+3 instead if Overflow is active for you.
101414030.baseFlair_: Oh, you really asked for it now! You just made my baby angry!

102414030.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw 3 cards.
102414030.baseFlair_: Dragons have no use for the worthless.

112414010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
112414010.baseFlair_: Elder dragons use human language to voice their discontent with mankind. Lower dragons use violence to express their discontent with mankind.

709414010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
709414010.baseFlair_:
One hundred push-ups! One hundred sit-ups!
And one hundred squats! Then a ten kilometer run.
Do it every single day!

900414010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
900414010.baseFlair_: The man sharpened his sword to slay dragons. The dragon rended the man with its inborn blades.

101424020.baseEffect_: Transform a follower into a Dragon.
101424020.baseFlair_: Accept the dragon's soul into thy body, and thou shalt know power both great and atrocious. Now turn!

117424010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 and Rush to a Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only when a targetable card is in your hand.)
117424010.baseFlair_: A solitary whelp tends to be careless, so you could make a quick rupie hunting them. But they get craftier as the years go by, so be prepared for a fight.

900424030.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
900424030.baseFlair_: A putrid breath for the corrupted.

104434010.baseEffect_: Discard your hand. Then deal 5 damage to all followers.
104434010.baseFlair_: The hunter carved out the heart of the sea dragon and held it aloft for all to see. That moment marked both the beginning and the end of everything. —Chapter 2, History of the Desert

107434010.baseEffect_:
Destroy all damaged followers.
Deal 1 damage to all undamaged followers.
107434010.baseFlair_: Their roars should never be heard as one—surely an omen of Armageddon.

900444020.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees that have been destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
If you've played other Shadow's Corrosions this match, destroy a random enemy follower.
900444020.baseFlair_: Ignorance cradles death. Assumption bears negligence. Knowing this, you would still challenge me? Very well. Face my curse.

105412010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform this amulet into a Dragon if the opponent has more cards in play than you.
105412010.baseFlair_: Looks like it could spring to life at any moment.

900443010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, give +0/+2, Rush, and Bane to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
900443010.baseFlair_: A flash of light arcs across the sky as a dragon takes off from the field, unharmed. Having fought her last battle, the hero Romelia resigns. She bestows a gift upon her comrades, cheeks pink as she says, "Lightning leaves no trace, but I'd like you to remember me."

100411020.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
100411020.baseFlair_: The great need no reasons for their actions. They simply move and eat as they wish.
100411020.evoFlair_: The great need not reflect on their actions. They simply exist as they wish to, which is proof of their strength.

101411070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
101411070.baseFlair_: A dragon glides through the deep, its blade ever ready to skewer evil intruders.
101411070.evoFlair_: The dragon's blade is a weapon wielded against enemies of the ocean. In return for its deeds, the dragon is loved and respected by the mermaids.

102411060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca if Overflow is active for you.
102411060.baseFlair_: The fierce sea serpent and her kin emerged from the depths of the ocean, cutting through the turbulent waves and swirling currents.
102411060.evoFlair_: The sea serpent sways her vast body, kicking up waves that block the sun. To approach her watery domain means a one-way trip to the depths.

103411030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
103411030.baseFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll get a face full of fire breath.
103411030.evoFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll be incinerated into ash.

104411040.baseFlair_: A seahorse that defends dark, icy waters. As it races through the depths, it's more beautiful than even the finest horses on the surface could ever hope to be.
104411040.evoFlair_: It has no forgiveness for those who invade its sanctuary and violate the sanctity of life. Once it begins to shake with rage, there is no time left for regrets or apologies.

108411020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever you play a non-follower card, gain +1/+0.
108411020.baseFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's tainted, but these claws and fangs are a way of life for me.
108411020.evoFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's heretical, but I can't turn a blind eye to this much evil.

113411020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
113411020.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a girl on a wyvern? One named Eyfa who rides a little rough? Huh, you mean she flew by just a second ago! Thanks... I've got to hurry up and catch her!
113411020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, give another allied follower Storm.
113411020.evoFlair_: Eyfa's a little careless at times, but she's a trusty partner and pilot. Keep that a secret though—it would be so embarrassing if she found out what I said.

114411040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower and deal 3 damage if it is already damaged. If it has not been damaged, deal 1 damage instead.
114411040.baseFlair_: I'm so sick of hearing how I don't have wings, or that my tail is weird. Shut your face gash! Or maybe you'd like a few new orifices!
114411040.evoFlair_: No one asked for your opinion. I'm me, and I'll do things my own way. Dig the wax outta your ears and listen good. Or I'll drill you a couple new ones and see if you hear any better through those.

115411030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1 and gain Bane.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
115411030.baseFlair_:
The sight of its vicious poison drifting through the air is truly breathtaking. And the sweet scent is incredibly soothing, don't you think? Oh how I wish I could stay by its side and enjoy this fragrance forever.
—Young assistant visiting Dinosaur Island
115411030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115411030.evoFlair_:
The dilophosaurus possesses a fierce, deadly poison. By consuming toxic plants, its body secretes a combination of antibodies and poison. The poison exudes a relaxing fragrance, serving to lure in the beast's prey.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

900411010.baseFlair_: A beast that boasts claws, fangs, and wings—but not an ounce of compassion.
900411010.evoFlair_: Trampling, crushing, rampaging—dragon is just another word for destruction.

101421050.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
101421050.baseFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning can also strike those who seek to control it.
101421050.evoFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning does not discriminate between its victims. It strikes gods, demons, and humans alike.

102421010.baseFlair_: Awaken the savagery hidden within you, and sharpen the fangs that sleep there.
102421010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Transform an allied follower into a Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
102421010.evoFlair_: Howl with the ferocity you once suppressed, and feast on all that you crave!

104421020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and gain +2/+2.
104421020.baseFlair_: The past gave way to the future, the future gave way to the past, and the world fell into disorder after countless ages. And when the liquid in the chalice of the gods was poisoned, I was tainted along with it. Now everything hurts, and only your life can provide relief.
104421020.evoFlair_: There is no longer a dragon to protect the chalice of the gods. There is only me, a hideous Pucewyrm. So come to me and offer up your lives. Nothing else can soothe my pain now.

104421040.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Enhance (8): Deal 3 damage instead.
104421040.baseFlair_: The flame dragon is much like a capricious cook. On some days it wants to char its food black; on other days a light searing is enough to satisfy it.
104421040.evoFlair_: If the flame dragon is in a good mood, you might get away with nothing but a minor burn. But if it's in a bad mood, odds are your ashes will be scattered by the wind.

106421010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
106421010.baseFlair_: Yahoo! Me 'n' this big lug, we're unstoppable! We're gonna steal all the treasure the world's got!
106421010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
106421010.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! How's our speed for you? Faster and faster, we're off like the wind!

108421020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a White Breath or Black Breath into your hand.
108421020.baseFlair_: Some say it's white. Some say it's black. But it's only natural that there's some disagreement. That dragon is a mirror of the heart. —Words of a dragon knower
108421020.evoFlair_: Some say it's the light. Others say it's the dark. But it's both, and it's neither. Dragons can't be measured by human standards. —Words of a dragon knower

111421010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, draw 2 cards.
111421010.baseFlair_:
Once tasted, the pleasure of tormenting the weak would not relinquish its hold; the light of the righteous path could not compare. What remained in the noble beast's place was but the wrack of a dragon.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide
111421010.evoFlair_:
It devours not out of need but out of greed. Of the proud creature it once was, no trace remains. It is an abomination. Blasphemy against the natural order.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide

116421020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Discard a card. If it was a Natura card, gain Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
116421020.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it chews that grass, what a fascinating fellow. From its big dewy eyes, to its flowery back—you ever see anything else like it? Wonder how it tastes though. Y'all got any of 'em for sale?
—Hungry Cook, on His Visit to Dinosaur Island
116421020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116421020.evoFlair_:
As the dinosaurs adapted to machinery, their physiology began to evolve. Some grew scales as hard as iron, while some blossomed with carapace anew. Just as rapids cut through stone, the changes would not be stopped.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 2

106431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Dragoncraft card in your hand.
106431010.baseFlair_: Her song rings clearly throughout the skies. Lured by the tune, a dragon lands beside her and folds its wings closed.
106431010.evoFlair_: As if accompanying her song, the dragon roars and begins to sound its wings. When human and dragon voices merge in symphony, both the heavens and earth tremble.

109431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, deal 2 damage to this follower, and gain an empty play point orb. If Overflow is active for you, give your leader the following effect - Subtract 2 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
109431010.baseFlair_: Scathacha was a fake name to cover my real identity—True Dragon Deirdre, but I've grown accustomed to it now. You, too, would do well to refer to me by this preferred nomenclature.
109431010.evoFlair_: Honestly, the business of men is endlessly quaint. Ah, you there. Show me more of your people's ways. My eyes haven't yet had their fill of your customs. Hehe.

112431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of that card.
112431020.baseFlair_: Its storm-bearing wings transform into honed blades. With a single wing it rends the heavens; with both wings it shatters the earth as well.
112431020.evoFlair_: A single strike surpasses the power of both dragons and natural disasters alike. Splendid. —Aldos, Imperial Dragoon

115431010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ambush.
115431010.baseFlair_:
If one were to invade their neighbor, naught but absolute defeat awaits. Balance is tenuous; conflict is inevitable. War blossoms like weeds in a flower bed.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Eighth Scroll
115431010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115431010.evoFlair_:
No one knows who stands to benefit from the increasing ruin. Even so, there is no reason to stop fighting. What lies at the end of this conflict? The fate of the world is yet to be decided.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Ninth Scroll

119431020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a random Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points from your deck into your hand.
119431020.baseFlair_: It started out like any normal storm. But what sounded like distant thunder was actually a vicious roar. As if in answer, countless dragons took flight, disappearing from view somewhere far beyond the clouds. —Tales of Stormy Skies, Chapter 1
119431020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give +2/+2 to all Dragoncraft followers in your deck that originally cost 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points.
At the end of your turn, put a random Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 play points from your deck into your hand.
119431020.evoFlair_: Soon the sky was full of every kind of dragon imaginable, from lithe wyverns to steel-scaled drakes. They rained down blow after blow in a seemingly endless barrage of tooth and claw. This was a storm from which no one could take shelter. —Tales of Stormy Skies, Chapter 5

120431010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb.

120431010.baseFlair_: Slice and dice and everything nice! Ahh, is there anything better? Oh, sorry. Please, don't take this personally. I was only trying to help. I just got... hehe... carried away.

900443020.baseFlair_: A spear with a dragon's horn motif. Reacting to its user's magical energy, it also confers prodigious strength and the ability to wield draconic flames. This weapon has seen a certain royal commander through countless trials and triumphs.

100411040.baseEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
100411040.baseFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. Those who come to despoil them shall not have their way.
100411040.evoFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. It is my duty to cast potential intruders back down to the world below.

102411050.baseFlair_: A tireless whale with a deserted island on its back. The island, once inhabited by a sea god, is now visited only by the ocean breeze.
102411050.evoFlair_: The whale, now carrying an island without a master, occasionally leaps from the sea, shaking the distant waves with its cries for its fallen friend.

106411020.baseFlair_: On the battlefield I was born. The clang of iron was my lullaby; I was raised amid the scent of death. I know nothing else.
106411020.evoFlair_: Love makes some other people feel alive. But not me. For me only killing will do. I can't say this is any way to live, but all these hands know how to do is destroy.

108411010.baseFlair_: Pfft! You just headbutted a cloud, didn't you? We're never going to be like her at this rate. Hey! No, no, don't look so sad!
108411010.evoFlair_: Forte, my favoritest dark dragoon! The person I wanna be like! Someday we're gonna ride together, so I won't give up. Never!

116411020.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during a battle with the dragonfolk. He was wielding a weapon composited for increased maneuverability and power, almost like a dragon fang. Guess we've reached that kind of tech. —Engineer's Notes, Part 1
116411020.evoFlair_:
Through the power of tech, we've made tremendous leaps toward dragonkind. It may only be a matter of time, now, before we make them our subordinates. The dragonfolk shall see the flames of our ambition stoked yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 1

120411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower, then restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's defense.

120411030.evoFlair_: Do away with your scorn. Benevolence is not solely the purview of man. Though we beasts be sharp of claw, there is benefit in caring for and giving succor to your fellows.

900411020.baseFlair_: The malicious dragon wakes, and the world is rent asunder. The beast's insatiable hunger makes it view every living creature as prey.
900411020.evoFlair_: The dragon opens its jaws, and a flash of lightning forks through the sky. It is a fateful warning to those who would dare to cross the beast.

101421060.baseFlair_: This guy's all sorts of greedy, let me tell you. I mean, he could eat all of you and still be hungry. In fact, I think he's going to have to gobble down the very land you stand on.
101421060.evoFlair_: How was that, boy? Tasty? Heh-heh, that's okay. I know you enjoyed it. What, you're still hungry? Well, I guess you've got to keep eating then. Eat until there's no one left!

101421100.baseFlair_: A dragon who manipulates mists from its forest dwelling. While there are those who have seen this creature, no one has ever touched it, and many believe it to be nothing but an illusion caused by the fog.
101421100.evoFlair_: A dragon who hides in the forest, producing dense mists to shroud its woodland home. Rumor has it that these mists are intended to protect its former lover's remains.

103421040.baseFlair_: A wise owl that picked up a sword and headed to the battlefield to protect those it loves. Clad in sacred armor, the owl stands against all threats.

Who caused this? Why has this happened?

If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116441030.baseFlair_: Do not reason; do not justify. These are useless fetters. Smash your ideas, and you will surpass your meager origin. Thirst for a new form, and the dragon's claw shall twist your wish into being.
116441030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
116441030.evoFlair_: The body burns and the claws burst forth. This is the form of a dragon. I am unopposable, a seething power that will crush all!

----------
Rush.

120441020.baseFlair_: Another pointless day, another waste of time. All anyone does here is strut around threatening and killing each other. You want to rule? Be my guest. The sky is so dark you can't see a thing. Who'd want dominion over something so depressing?
120441020.evoFlair_: I just wanted to see everyone smile. So why'd it have to turn out this way? Today's no better than yesterday. Everything sucks. Fate is a lie and I want no part of it. All I really want is to fly freely in a bright blue sky... but that's just a naïve dream.

121441010.baseEffect_:

121441010.baseFlair_: "Beware the forest—though it hides them very well, it too has claws." His gaze narrows on his prey, waiting for the right moment. "If you're not careful, you may become the hunted." Cursed claws tear through the darkness, restoring peace to the woods.
121441010.evoFlair_:
"He said he likes the toy I made."
The people gaze up at him, wonder in their eyes.
"He looks kinda scary, but he's really a nice guy."
Even shadowy curses have a place in the forest's future.

900441060.baseEffect_: Gain Bane and Ward while an allied Aiela, Devoted Knight is in play.
900441060.baseFlair_: Wielding swords, overcoming storms, saving others, vanquishing monsters, and training diligently. The dragon finally trusts the girl as his partner. The two have bonded through friendship... Their journey begins here. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 7
900441060.evoFlair_:
"We're going off on an adventure!"
"Wow, the wind feels so great... I'm getting so excited!"
"Let's go, Mister Dragon! You and me and everyone together!"

104424010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.

Destroy an enemy follower.

101411080.evoFlair_: A dragon that has used the power of darkness to overcome death. Its claws secrete a venom, and it breathes a cloud of noxious smoke that inflames all living flesh.

101411130.evoFlair_: The chill breath of the ice dragon is capable of freezing human souls, sealing them away for eternity in a frosty prison.

Ward.

105411030.evoFlair_: Contemptible dragons, scoffing at the surface dwellers! Our leonine attacks will slice off your head and your pride.

113421030.evoFlair_: The wicked dragon's body runs brutally along a groove of destruction. As if in response to the howl, the beast's flames become its maw.

Ward.

118421010.baseFlair_: Yes, red flames do burn hot. But can you guess what's even hotter? That's right! Blue flames! Now, let's see if you can stand the heat!

118421010.evoFlair_: Red burns hot and blue burns even hotter. What would you get if you combined them? That's right! Violet flames! Now, let's see if there's anything left of you when I'm through!

900421010.baseFlair_: Having only known how to love, the young dragon spreads its wings. A roar of purity, an aegis for ivory-white scales.
900421010.evoFlair_: Its eyes take in all that is right. With unblighted warmth, it shall deliver order to the world of mankind.

900421020.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
900421020.baseFlair_: Having only known suffering, the young dragon spreads its wings. A roar of malice, annihilating all before its obsidian-black scales.
900421020.evoFlair_: Its eyes take in all that is dark. With depraved malice, it shall spread chaos to the world of mankind.

101431060.baseFlair_: A violent, writhing mass. Countless heads eating away at the world, spewing forth noxious gases which contaminate the atmosphere.
101431060.evoFlair_: Huge heads thrust into the land. Poisonous gases spew out into the air. The mighty serpent dragon consumes all before it: gods and monsters, heaven and earth.

102431010.baseFlair_: A beautiful goddess who watches over the paradise of the deep. She guides the noble sea beasts and their progeny through the depths.
102431010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Evolve all allied Megalorcas.
102431010.evoFlair_: A lovely goddess who rules the paradise of the deep. The sea creatures great and small sing of her as their queen, and love her as their mother.

119431030.baseFlair_: A dragonewt of the Seine and protector of the town of Rouen. When Romanus had Rouen razed to the ground, the Gargouille could do nothing but watch as the residents choked and burned. In his grief, he lost his mind and went on a rampage across the countryside.
119431030.evoFlair_: Consumed by rage, the Gargouille swore revenge on Romanus. He would tear him apart, burn him alive, choke the life from his body—the same fate to which he'd condemned the people of Rouen. And just like that, the Seine's gentle guardian became a terrible monster.

107441010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Hellflame Dragon.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, give it +0/+1.
107441010.baseFlair_: This battlefield is now ours—spread your wings and raise your claws! Now you'll all see what a real dragon looks like!
107441010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Hellflame Dragon.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, give it +0/+1.
107441010.evoFlair_: Even if these wings are torn—even if these claws are crushed, we'll never admit defeat! Until this very last scale is taken, we'll roam the skies and roar! This dragon will reign supreme!

109441020.baseEffect_:

----------

109441020.baseFlair_: It is the embodiment of deception detested by the gods. In this realm it takes the form of a dragon, only much more savage and truculent—a wry smile, corrupted with depravity. Avoid its treachery at all costs.
109441020.evoFlair_: It feeds on the sons of man, drinking their blood and devouring their bones. There is no end to the atrocities of the majestic king—a twisted roar, cruel and nefarious. Avoid approaching it at all costs.

110441020.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.

110441020.baseFlair_:
The manxome 'wock bereaves of speech
The most loquacious foe.
And in its burbling wake it leaves
Naught but bloodstains and woe.
—Song of the Unknowable
110441020.evoEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the end of your turn, randomly banish 1 of the lowest-cost followers in your deck and then gain +X/+X. X equals the cost of the banished card.

110441020.evoFlair_:
The figure of this fearsome beast
Would cause sane folk to tremble.
On dream and nightmare does it feast
Where toves do gyre and gimble.
—Song of the Unknowable

----------
Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Vanguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
111441020.baseFlair_: This tedious world has earned my fury. Foolish, rebellious peons... You will know the full extent of my wrath. Prepare to be fish food!
111441020.evoFlair_: The whirlpool of my fury will swallow the world. It's too late for apologies! You brought this war upon yourselves! Prepare to be blown away like sea foam!

112441010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, give +3/+1 to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
112441010.baseFlair_: I am Forte, ruler of the skies! If you wish to join my ranks, show me your power and prove that you are worthy, and I will become your wings!
112441010.evoFlair_: You remain steadfast, refusing to falter before me... Heh. I like that look in your eyes! Now soar—faster and higher! My wings will guide you along the path of victory!

115441020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Gain Storm and the following effect: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Follower Strike: Gain +2/+2 and the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
115441020.baseFlair_: Hey, you. Have you seen Inori around here? We got separated while on a... certain mission.
115441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115441020.evoFlair_: Looks like we've got monsters on our hands. Leave this to me. I'll send 'em all flying!

900441090.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever you discard cards, subtract X from the cost of this card. X equals the number of cards discarded.

Storm.
900441090.baseFlair_:
The keeper visited an azure dragon high in its roost. But the furious dragon would not listen to him. Nevertheless, the man tried to calm the dragon down.
—Summoner's Revolt, Second Telling
900441090.evoFlair_:
The azure dragon's lament left the man shaking with rage. Driven from its home, the creature had suffered unspeakable torment. The keeper wondered to himself: will mankind get away with anything?
—Summoner's Revolt, Third Telling

100424010.baseFlair_: The very world burns in its rays of flame.

106423010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, summon a Dragon.
106423010.baseFlair_: The thousand-year war came to an end on that day. The earth trembled, the winds raged, and a cruel roar sounded—both enemy and ally were gone. Peace was achieved, but it was born of great terror.

105432010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a Neutral follower, give it Storm and destroy it at the end of your turn.

101411090.baseFlair_: A fire dragon that has dwelt inside a volcano since time immemorial. Some call it Hero's End for eating so many would-be vanquishers.
101411090.evoFlair_: When the fire dragon becomes angry, the flames surrounding its body glow an incandescent blue and turn anything they touch into ash.

107411030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. A random enemy follower can't attack next turn.
107411030.baseFlair_: Bwahaha! Nature's saute, nature's sorbet! Still... there's something missing! Coctura Integro! —Gourmet Emperor Khaiza
107411030.evoFlair_:
As expected from the Gourmet Emperor himself. The firedragon is impeccably chilled as an appetizing side dish, and the frostdragon is grilled to perfection. This deserves nothing less than a perfect score.
—Lyriola, Supreme Critic

114411010.baseEffect_:

114411010.baseFlair_:
"Grroooar!"
"A challenge! Let's see who can take that beast down first!"
—Dragonblader and his rival
114411010.evoFlair_:
"Graaahhhr!"
"Our rivalry keeps us sharp, doesn't it! You know I'm the only one who could match a blade to your fangs!"
—Dragonblader and his rival

118411030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Restore 2 defense to your leader. Draw 2 cards.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Draw 3 cards.
118411030.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a very hungry dragon appeared before two rival villages. One village, seeking to wreak havoc on the other, tried to tame the dragon with pumpkins. But as it turned out, the dragon was a compassionate creature and went off with the pumpkins as a gift.
118411030.evoFlair_: The delicious gift from the dragon brought peace to the villagers' hearts and soon, peace between the villages. And tonight, on the anniversary of that fateful day, we celebrate by exchanging fresh produce and clothing native to our respective lands.

111421020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of the opponent's turn, if this follower has been damaged, restore 2 defense to this follower and gain Ward.
111421020.baseFlair_: I've abandoned my humanity. I gave everything to gain power, to better my country. The dragon's blood coursing through my veins is proof of my resolve. Come, Oswald. Let us fly, my friend.
111421020.evoFlair_: I will never forget the people who laid down their lives for change. For my part, I laid down my humanity... and gained conviction in exchange. The road to dominion is drenched in blood, but the only way is forward.

103431020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an Anne, Belle of Mysteria and evolve it.
103431020.baseFlair_: Anne, quit dragging me over to the— Oh, hello there! So you're the new student. Good to meet you!
103431020.evoFlair_: I like this school. Everyone's just so nice. I'm sure you'll love it too!

108431020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a non-follower card, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
108431020.baseFlair_: Hey, you heard what they're saying? It's about the warrior with the horned helmet. They say that underneath the armor, he's really a dragon! —Battlefield rumors
108431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108431020.evoFlair_: He doesn't speak a word to anyone, and nobody's seen his face. But when he meets an enemy that seems worth his trouble, he opens his visor and spits flames! —Battlefield rumors

109431030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Poseidon's Guard.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 2 Poseidon's Guards.
109431030.baseFlair_: In a palace of deepest depths he resides. The god of the seas, the king of a nation, the commander of his army.
109431030.evoFlair_: The ocean blue fosters life, but do not be deceived by its gentle facade. With a swing of his trident, a mighty tempest can brew at any given instant.

111431010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all damaged enemy followers.
111431010.baseFlair_:
Dragons reign over the skies. It is a source of great pride to them. Therefore when they descend to earth you may be sure, their goal is nothing less than absolute destruction.
—Veteran Dragonslayer
111431010.evoFlair_:
Their tread is heavy enough to shatter rock. The lash of their tails can cleave mountains. They rule the sky because they love it. If they should come to despise the land... well. It would be the end of all things.
—Veteran Dragonslayer

121431020.baseEffect_:

----------
Ward.

121431020.baseFlair_: Harm not the dragon, for it is sacrosanct. Those who dare will find their attempt dispersed with a mighty flap of wings. The dragon shall soar o'er ocean, mountain, and clouds to return to its home, awakening the pactbearers scattered far and wide.
121431020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121431020.evoFlair_: When the pactbearers have gathered, the dragon shall rise up in all its majesty, its scales gleaming in the light. Its mighty roar is a call to arms. Roused, the other dragons shall respond in kind to fulfill their vows as prophecy has decreed.

101441030.baseFlair_: Assemble before me, beloved dragons! I am about to set you free! The time has come for you to return to your rightful place and regain dominion over all living things!
101441030.evoFlair_: Fly, my beautiful dragons, fly! Be proud of your fangs! Your claws! Your wings! No one can stand in your way! It is time to unleash your power upon the world!

104441020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

104441020.baseFlair_: Life and death. Endings and beginnings. An absolute force that governs the ever-spinning, ever-repeating cycle of destiny.
104441020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104441020.evoFlair_: This serpent depicts an endless cycle, and it represents both everything and nothing. All fated to be repeated as the world spins into eternity is within the belly of this limitless serpent.

105441020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all other allied followers. For each follower, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
105441020.baseFlair_: Such vociferous jaws and grasping claws! Thy brillig name upon the lips lingereth, and never shall it vade! —Poems of Unbeing
105441020.evoFlair_: Thine eyes of flame so blaze! Let thy name resound, unbeing Jabberwock. And the chaos shall as order seem. —Poems of Unbeing

Rush.
Ward.

113441020.baseFlair_:
"A sword to pierce any shield," shouted the bladesmith.
"A shield to stop all swords," argued the shieldsmith.
Both were squashed by a dragon, so the truth was never known. —Fighting at the Feet of Dragons, "The How and Why"
113441020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
113441020.evoFlair_:
"The sky is crumbling and falling," wept the worrier.
"What's the sense in fretting," laughed his wife.
Since all were helpless before the dragon, I could tell the wife was correct. —Trembling at the Might of Dragons, "The How and Why"

114441010.baseEffect_:

Ward.
